attributes.action: Remove or extend the 2 hour parking limit in motorway service stations
attributes.additional_details:
With the accident rate rising, motorway information boards saying don't drive when tired
It seems counter productive to have a 2 hour limit on parking at service stations. Lots of drivers will not stop and rest due to the fear of oversleeping. 
Service Stations are built to provide a rest area for motorists charging for parking defeats this.
attributes.background: Motorists are not resting at service stations due to parking charges.
